author: mseidel42
body:
#### PR description:

Pythia 8.310 expects a shared_ptr for the random number generator now, see corresponding https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/8938

I changed `unique_ptr` with `shared_ptr` in various places and it compiles but 
`runTheMatrix.py -j 10 -l 14234.0`
gives segfault in
`#5  0x00007f6a1e22000a in gen::P8RndmEngine::setRandomEngine (v=0x7f6a20b25b80, this=0x0) at /build/mseidel/CMSSW_14_0_X_2024-01-22-2300/src/GeneratorInterface/Pythia8Interface/interface/P8RndmEngine.h:34`

@wddgit I think this touches a lot of your work, could you have a look, please?
title: Adaptions for Pythia 8.310
